alldb.table_sql: SELECT * FROM BASE_DOCUMENT_SAVED_INFOS where saved_data_key_ = '{savedDataKey}' /~:savedDataKey1: AND SAVED_DATA_KEY_1='{savedDataKey1}'~/ /~:savedDataKey2: AND SAVED_DATA_KEY_2='{savedDataKey2}'~/ /~:savedDataKey3: AND SAVED_DATA_KEY_3='{savedDataKe3}'~/ /~:savedDataKey4: AND SAVED_DATA_KEY_4='{savedDataKey4}'~/ /~:savedDataKey5: AND SAVED_DATA_KEY_5='{savedDataKey5}'~/
